questions.question_text: Which two statements about NTLM authentication are correct? (Choose two.)

choices.B: It is useful when users log in to DCs that are not monitored by a collector agent.
choices.D: It takes over as the primary authentication method when configured alongside FSSO.
choices.A: It requires DC agents on every domain controller when used in multidomain environments.

discussion.content: ByC correcto. De acuerdo con pollyy
B & C - correct - equal distance of 25

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

A firewall administrator must configure equal cost multipath (ECMP) routing on FGT1 to ensure both port1 and port3 links are used, at the same time, for all traffic destined for 172.20.2.0/24.
Given the network diagram shown in the exhibit, which two static routes will satisfy this requirement on FGT1? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Correct is C & D - Security_Manual, p. 275

questions.question_text: On a FortiGate with a hard disk, how frequently can you upload logs to FortiAnalyzer or FortiManager? (Choose two.)

choices.A: The VPN is configured to use pre-shared key authentication.
choices.C: Remote is the host name of the remote IPsec peer.

discussion.content: Correct is A - PSK authentication succeeded

questions.question_text:
An administrator needs to create an SSL-VPN connection for accessing an internal server using the bookmark, Port Forward.
Which step must the administrator take to successfully achieve this configuration?

choices.B: Configure the client application to forward IP traffic through FortiClient.
choices.C: Configure the virtual IP address to be assigned to the SSL VPN users.
choices.A: Configure an SSL VPN realm for clients to use the Port Forward bookmark.
choices.D: Configure the client application to forward IP traffic to a Java applet proxy.
